summary: Rapunzel and Flynn Rider have their wedding, but Pascal and Maximus must recover the rings they lose in mid-ceremony.
cast: Mandy Moore|Zachary Levi|Alan Dale|Paul F. Tompkins|Kari Wahlgren|Mark Allan Stewart|Byron Howard|Nathan Greno|Sophia I. Aguirre|Robert Bagnell|Erin Matthews|Matt Nolan|Caleigh Ranjo|Miranda Reed|Sadie Leia Roberts|Lisa Linder
title: Enredados para siempre
